Why we're confident you'll love COOLest Gel

We've dedicated the past 10 years in perfecting an affordable mattress that promises the same level of comfort and support as the more premium ones. Today, we deliver on that promise as we passed the industry's most rigorous test - all with flying colors.

  • Knitted Jacquard Fabric

    Intricately designed using precision knitting machines, the COOLest Gel mattress’ exterior fabric has a soft texture, greater extensibility and elasticity in addition to good wrinkle resistance and breathability.

  • Fire Resistant Base

    We’ve designed the COOLest Gel mattress to last even in extremely demanding and fire hazardous environments. The base layer contains a fabric that consists of fire retardant materials such as Aramid and rayon.

  • COOLest Gel-Infused Memory Foam

    Providing healthy support that helps you wake up free from aches and pains, our gel-infused memory foam regulates body temperature and promotes breathability – creating iconic sleep experiences every night.

  • Pressure Relief High-Density Foam

    Having almost twice the density of conventional foams, this high-density layer returns to shape after compression, offering a good balance between the mattress’ softness and support and providing pressure relief during sleep.

  • Support High-Density Foam

    COOLest Gel’s ultra-solid base foam is packed with high-density polymer material that gives overall support and durability to the whole mattress while preventing sinking and sagging of the upper layers.

The Mattress of Your Dreams

Icon Sleep's COOLest has a gel-infused memory foam top that promotes a conducive sleep environment for all sleepers. This dream-inducing layer on top of durable pressure relief and support foams make up for an outstanding mattress architecture that promises more well-rested mornings.

Learn More

Finding The Perfect Firmness For You

Dont know which mattress firmness is for you? 88% of sleepers prefer a mattress that is in the happy medium range of 4-7. See below chart for illustration on how our mattress is constructed to please the masses.

The Iconic Difference

Icon Sleep mattresses are not necessarily better. But compared to what the competition offer, we present the most
reasonably priced package for the same quality. In short, we offer the same value for less.

*All prices are for Queen-sized mattress models.

The COOLest bed you’ll own is fiberglass-free.

Here at Icon Sleep, part of our sustainable vision of a well-rested world is a sleeping environment that poses no threat to anyone’s health. That’s why we’ve developed an affordable mattress free from the dangers of fiberglass.

Learn More

Nothing Beats Homemade

Manufacturing from a state-of-the-art facility in McDonough, Georgia, Icon Sleep delivers on its promise of a budget-friendly and well-made mattress by adhering to strict federal standards. Since 2018, our production line has been moved to the US, allowing us and our customers to save thousands of dollars worth of warranty claims. Truly, nothing beats homemade quality!

Have questions?

Here are some frequently asked questions.

What's the best mattress size for me?

Choosing the right mattress size depends on several factors. Are you sharing your bed with a partner or pets? Do you like having plenty of living space in your bedroom? How do you want your bed to be placed?

Read More

What type of foundation should I use for my mattress?

Our mattresses can work with almost all standard foundations. The harder and sturdier the base, the better the mattress will perform, as with all foam beds. Platform bases offer the most support, but steel or wooden...

Read More

How long should I wait before I can use my mattress?

You may start using it right out of the box! Take note, however, that it would take 48 hours up to a week for your mattress to fully decompress. Sleeping on your mattress can help with the decompression.

Read More

components/common/responsive-img: {{!-- This file implements the lazysizes srcset pattern (as seen on https://github.com/aFarkas/lazysizes#modern-transparent-srcset-pattern) for maximum performance on modern browsers and reasonable compatibility with legacy browsers. There are a few important arguments to know about when using this component: `lazyload`: - If set to 'lazyload+lqip', will load a low-res image which will be replaced by lazysizes - ensuring that SOME content is shown immediately on page load. Without LQIP, a transparent gif will be used instead, which reduces the number of requests needed to load the page, making it even faster. - If set to 'lazyload', the browser will not load the full-size image at first, instead the lazysizes plugin will load it progressively after page load. This improves the load speed of the page, but it should be disabled for high-priority above-the-fold images. - If set to 'disabled', will not attempt to lazyload the image and instead tell the browser to load it immediately. Use this for high-priority images that are above the fold. `fallback_size`: This is the size to use for this image in legacy browsers that do not support srcset. Can be defined as a pixel bounding-box size (e.g. "123x123) or inherent width (e.g. "123w"). `class`: The CSS classes to add to the image, e.g. "card-image". If lazyloading is enabled, all images will have the "lazyload" class so that lazysizes will target them automatically. `otherAttributes`: Any other HTML attributes you want on the img tag, for example "height='100' width='100'" `default_image`: The default image to use if `image` is undefined or falsy. Should be a theme asset, usually defined as a relative path in the theme config. If a default image is not provided, you'll get an image tag with no image if the primary image is undefined. `lqip_size`: If you want to specify a particular size for the LQIP image, you can do so with this argument. A default of 80 pixels wide will be used otherwise. This argument has no effect if the lazyload mode is not "lazyload+lqip". --}}

Fold Me

Easy Setup

Have questions?

Here are some frequently asked questions.

Can I adjust the height of my bed frame?

It depends on what frame you’re using. Refer to your owner’s manual for more details.

Read More

What is the weight capacity of my bed frame?

It depends on the type and size of the frame. You can refer to your manual for more information regarding the frame’s maximum capacity.

Read More

Does my bed frame require a box spring?

The Highrise™ series of durable, top-quality platform frames do not require a box spring. However, all Malouf basic bed frames need a box spring to provide additional support for the mattress.

Read More

Where are the legs to my headboard?

Malouf’s headboards have a hidden compartment on the back, under a Velcro-secured flap. Inside, you’ll find all the required hardware and legs—secured and tucked away safely for the shipping process.

Read More

Have questions?

Here are some frequently asked questions.

Can I use my existing mattress with an adjustable bed base?

Before purchasing, check with the manufacturer of your mattress. Most foam- and innerspring-based mattresses work with an adjustable base. We recommend mattresses between 10” to 12” for best fitting with our bed bases.

Product Features

Ultra-premium sheets are hand-finished by artisans in northern Italy

Extra-long staple pure Egyptian cotton offers soft drape, distinctive luster, and amazing durability

Hand-Finished By Italian Artisans

Hand-finished in a multi-generational confection house in Florence. these sheets demonstrate the perfection and artistry of Italian craftsmen. Italians artisans foster pride in workmanship and subtle elegance in their product: they sew, cut, and fit the sheets better than anyone else in the world

Premium Egyptian Cotton

Renowned for its soft drape, distinctive luster, and amazing durability, extra-long-staple Egyptian cotton tops the list of premium bedding materials-for good reason. Purchasing a set of luxury Egyptian cotton bedding is an investment in comfort that will last for generations.

Hand-Drawn Hemstitching

A classic percale weave creates a crisp, clean, and smooth finish that softens with every wash. Each sheet set features a hand-drawn ornamental hemstitch. On unboxing your set, you'll discover a card signed by the artisan who hand-finished your bedding.

Made To Fit Better

With generous, oversized dimensions and Universal Fit technology, our sheets were designed to securely fit all mattress styles-and look luxurious.

it’s mainly due to the pandemic situation disrupting our supply chains. Rest assured, however,

Smooth, Round Fibers

Before purchasing, check with the manufacturer of your mattress. Most foam- and innerspring-based mattresses work with an adjustable base. We recommend mattresses between 10” to 12” for best fitting with our bed bases.

What is Reach Assist™ on the S755 Adjustable Bed Base?

Malouf’s ultra-luxurious S750 (currently not available here at Icon Sleep) and S755 bed bases have a feature called Reach Assist™, which pulls the bed back toward the wall as you incline for easy access to your nightstand.

How does the Snore Detection feature work on the Malouf Base App™?

OUR MOST ECO-FRIENDLY SHEET SET

THE BENEFITS OF TENCEL™ LYOCELL FIBERS

The 100 percent Tencel™ Lyocell fibers in this sheet set feature exceptional thermal regulation, enhanced breathability, minimal static charge, and create a beautiful drape with rich color retention. Plus, the fibers are unfavorable for bacterial growth, giving you a cleaner sleep environment.

BOTANIC ORIGIN

Tencel™ Lyocell fibers are derived from sustainable wood sources, harvested from certified and controlled sources following the stringent guidelines of the Lenzing Wood and Pulp Policy. Wood and pulp used by the Lenzing Group comes from natural forests and sustainably managed plantations. All Tencel™ Lyocell fiber types have been certified as biodegradable and compostable.

SUSTAINABLE PRODUCTION

TENCEL™ Lyocell is created in an environmentally responsible, closed-loop production process, which transforms wood pulp into cellulosic fibers with high resource efficiency and low ecological impact. This award-winning, solvent-spinning process recycles process water and reuses the solvent at a recovery rate of more than 99 percent.

Watch the 3in Down Mattress Topper Product Highlights

Product Features

Missing some reviews? No worries

it’s mainly due to the pandemic situation disrupting our supply chains. Rest assured, however,
that our universally loved toppers will always be deserving of your 5-star review.

Have questions?

Here are some frequently asked questions.

What mattress topper is right for me?

It depends on your preferences and the way you want to enjoy your sleep. As a rule of thumb, the thicker the topper, the more space you’ll have to sink into it.

Read More

Will a mattress topper make my mattress firmer?

No. Icon Sleep’s toppers (designed and made by Malouf) are light and responsive. As a result, our toppers will make a firm mattress softer and more swaddled. If you’re looking for a bouncier, firmer feel, try our hybrid mattress.

Read More

Does a mattress topper affect the density of a memory foam?

The density of your mattress topper does not, in any way, affect the performance of your memory foam mattress.

Read More

Should I buy a mattress topper or a new mattress?

If your mattress is too firm, buying a topper is the best way to go. However, if you notice your mattress getting too soft, lumpy, or has depressions that aren’t there before, it’s time for you to purchase a new mattress.

Read More
